类型: Color: Black With Sliver BuckleSize: Fit for Waist Size 39''-42''
评论详情: I was surprised at the texture of this belt, as it is a little bit soft on the front side. It does, however, crease a little on the inside which makes me wonder about its durability over time. I intended to use this for cosplay, so I do not know how well it would stand up for daily use. All of that said it's fine for a cosplay prop or for limited use but just be careful about its durability over time.
